title: Six Nominations Sent to the Senate – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
January 9, 2019
Michael Graham, of Kansas, to be a Member of the National Transportation Safety Board for a term expiring December 31, 2020, vice Earl F. Weener, term expired.Jennifer L. Homendy, of Virginia, to be a Member of the National Transportation Safety Board for a term expiring December 31, 2024. (Reappointment)Geoffrey William Seiji Okamoto, of California, to be Deputy Under Secretary of the Treasury, vice Ramin Toloui.Heath P. Tarbert, of Maryland, to be Chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, vice J. Christopher Giancarlo.Heath P. Tarbert, of Maryland, to be a Commissioner of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission for a term expiring April 13, 2024, vice J. Christopher Giancarlo, term expiring.Andrew Wheeler, of Virginia, to be Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, vice Scott Pruitt.
